name: ORECHUUSEN
description:
This is just a game that i and my friends made for C# programming language final project in my University

Orechuusen is a simple space shooter game, the purpose of this game is just shooting at enemy as many as you can, if you shoot enemy your score will increase by 100 points. At the beginning you have 3 lives, your life points will decrease if you get shooted by enemy or you collided with an enemy, if you lose all of your lives, this game is over, you can play again with score resetted to 0.
